 "Don't try and be sneaky on this ship," Panzertron
said to Delta, "It could get you shot."

  "Panzertron to control," he said into his arm
comlink," Visitors are aboard. No one else is
scheduled to arrive so anything enter our area destroy
it."

  He turned to the visitors, "The General has
authroised you a tour of the ship and we can discuss
and alliance during this time. Thou you will have to
check your weapons in, we have a lot of stuff below
decks that don't respond well to weapons fire. Or if
you prefer to keep your weapons we can just go to the bridge."
